Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: daniel
Reviews.Content: this is a great fon. it gives me all want i want. i was expecting it to have wi-fi hot spot but no.the only problem i have with this fon is that i need to touch the screen couple of times for the qwerty keys to  show.the map is germany and i have to download from computer that is what the manual says. that makes it a little behind technology.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Keith D. Hammond "Keith"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these for gifts in Ghana Africa ,everyone loved them! they both work great! I will buy again.

Reviews.Title: It's body is slime and good out look and price.
Reviews.Author: Bijaya Kumar Lama
Reviews.Content: I like it because found it good shipping, communication, all assocories, and good price. I got it at google. Thank you

Reviews.Title: SORRYSERVICE
Reviews.Author: JERRY
Reviews.Content: I ORDER THIS PHONE ON 3-14-12 AND IT WORKED GOOD FOR ABOUT 6 WEEKS. THE ORDER SAID U.S VERSION WITH WARRANTY .I CHECKED WITH NOKIA AND THEY SAID THAT THIS PHONE DID NOT HAVE A U.S WARRANTY. I WOUDLD NOT RECOMMEND THIS PHONE .

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Carlos Coraizaca
Reviews.Content: Ok ,The product is very good for the use i want give,the description the same is complet onthe page amazon.
